 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עִדָּן‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Dan.2.9|Dan 2:9]]</sup> ==time== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***id.***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, perhaps loan-word from Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***adannu***</u></abbr>, ***fixed***, ***appointed***, or ***definite, time***; [Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> probably Aramaic loan-word, [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>ZMG liii (1899), 197</sup>]); — absolute <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ע‎</span> [[Dan.7.12|Dan 7:12]] +; emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עִדָּנָא‎</span> [[Dan.2.8|Dan 2:8]] +; plural absolute <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עִדָּנִין‎</span> [[Dan.4.13|Dan 4:13]] +, emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עִדָּנַיָּא‎</span> [[Dan.2.21|Dan 2:21]] — 

**1.** in general, ***time***, as duration [[Dan.2.8|Dan 2:8]]; [[Dan.7.12|Dan 7:12]] involving specific conditions [[Dan.2.9|Dan 2:9]]; [[Dan.2.21|Dan 2:21]] (point of) ***time*** [[Dan.3.5|Dan 3:5]]; [[Dan.3.15|Dan 3:15]]. 

**2.** definite time, = ***year*** (as modern Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">χρόνος</span>, see EASophocles<sup>1173</sup>): <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שִׁבְעָה ע‎</span> = ***seven years***, [[Dan.4.13|Dan 4:13]]; [[Dan.4.20|Dan 4:20]]; [[Dan.4.22|Dan 4:22]]; [[Dan.4.29|Dan 4:29]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עִדָּן וְעִדָּנִין וּפְלַג עִדָּן‎</span> [[Dan.7.25|Dan 7:25]] (i.e. 3 1/2 years, see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]; perhaps read dual for plural, compare [[BDB#Bev|Bev]] [[BDB#Gunk|Gunk]]<sup>Schöpf. 201</sup>).
